['DescriptionExclusive Links Real Estate is pleased to present to the market this one of a kind three story fully upgraded Gallery View on Palm Jumeirah,located near the tip of the frond on the sought after Palm Jumeirah with outstanding views of the Burj al Arab.
This architecturally inspiring Signature Villa sits on a plot size of 13,400 sq. ft and is the most popular style due to its fantastic open layout and has been well maintained throughout with one owner only since completion. The villa is arranged over three floors with an impressive BUA of 12,700 sq ft and boasts six bedrooms finished with beautiful interiors, high ceilings and large windows that fill the home with natural light.
The ground floor comprises a large modern open plan kitchen with Gaggenau appliances, the ground floor has been fully extended with floor to ceiling windows overlooking the beautifully landscaped garden and swimming pool.
Situated on the ground floor are two spacious en-suite bedrooms with two more located mid-way between the ground and first floors. The master bedroom is located on the first floor along with the fifth bedroom, both with large balcony and their own en-suites.The first floor has been extended along with adding an additional floor to install a cinema room, gym and library.
Viewings are highly recommended Call Jason +971561159041']

descriptions:
['DescriptionThe townhouse is in very beautiful location , direct to the sea with a beautiful view.
Mina Al Arab is a beautifully landscaped waterfront community in Ras Al Khaimah with protected coastal wetlands and natural pristine beaches. 
At only 45 minutes from Dubai, it provides easy access to Emirates Road, malls, local schools, hotels, golf course, etc. and has excellent facilities such as children’s play area, tennis court, swimming pool and private beach access. It is a place where you can enjoy a quiet and serene lifestyle.
This development offers a broad range of villas, townhouses and shoreline apartments with spectacular views of the sea. 
Ras Al Khaimah also is a promising industrial, commercial destination with attractive propositions for all kinds of investors. Ras al Khaimah is proving to be an investment haven due to its Free zones that allow 100% foreign ownership, improved infrastructure and its proximity to Dubai
We  rent and manage individually owned residential properties.']
